item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Power ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Controls power on Current Loop Adapter outputs +24V, +12V

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Power Off ({#AI_MEMO})
trigger_prototype.description: Current Loop Adapter is Power Off

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Current ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Current via RS_P, RS_N contacts of Current Loop Adapter, mA

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Resistance ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Resistance of the Current Loop, Ohm

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Safe Range High ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Top marging of Safe Range, mA or V or Ohm. If not specified, value is -32768

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Safe Range Low ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Bottom marging of Safe Range, mA or V or Ohm. If not specified, value is -32768

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Status ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Status of Current Loop Signal, failure 1w = no reply from the adapter on 1wire bus, failureAnalog = signal is beyond it's Working Range, belowSafe, safe, aboveSafe - status of the signal relative to the Safe Range margins

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} ({#AI_MEMO}) Status: above safe range
trigger_prototype.description: Analog input value above the safe range

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} ({#AI_MEMO}) Status: below safe range
trigger_prototype.description: Analog input value below the safe range

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} ({#AI_MEMO}) Status: SENSOR NOT FOUND
trigger_prototype.description: No reply from the adapter on 1wire bus

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} ({#AI_MEMO}) Status: signal is beyond it's Working Range
trigger_prototype.description: Analog signal is beyond it's working range

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Voltage ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Voltage on RS_P contact of Current Loop Adapter Vs Ground, V

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Work Range High ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Top marging of Working Range, mA or V or Ohm. If monitored value is outide of Working Range, Analog Failure take place. If not specified, value is -32768

item_prototype.name: Analog Input {#SNMPINDEX} Work Range Low ({#AI_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Bottom marging of Working Range, mA or V or Ohm. If monitored value is outide of Working Range, Analog Failure take place. If not specified, value is -32768

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Humidity Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#H_MEMO}) Status: HUMIDITY ABOVE SAFE RANGE
{HOST.NAME} - Humidity Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#H_MEMO}) Status: HUMIDITY BELOW SAFE RANGE
{HOST.NAME} - Humidity Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#H_MEMO}) Status: HUMIDITY SENSOR NOT FOUND
{HOST.NAME} - Humidity Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#H_MEMO}) Status: TEMPERATURE ABOVE SAFE RANGE
{HOST.NAME} - Humidity Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#H_MEMO}) Status: TEMPERATURE BELOW SAFE RANGE
{HOST.NAME} - Humidity Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#H_MEMO}) Status: TEMPERATURE SENSOR NOT FOUND

item_prototype.name: Relay {#SNMPINDEX} Powered ({#R_MEMO})
item_prototype.description: Presence of alternating current at the output (relay operation test) 0 - no alternating current at the output socket 1 - AC current present at the output socket

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - Temperature Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#T_MEMO}) Status: ABOVE SAFE RANGE
{HOST.NAME} - Temperature Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#T_MEMO}) Status: BELOW SAFE RANGE
{HOST.NAME} - Temperature Sensor {#SNMPINDEX} ({#T_MEMO}) Status: NOT FOUND
trigger_prototype.description: Температурный датчик сломан или не подключен
